sentences.sContent: When we were kids, a trip to the beach was a real treat .
sentences.sCn: 我们小时候，到海滩去玩是件特别开心的事。

phrases.pCn: 不招待就使坏（指万圣节孩子们挨家逐户要糖果等礼物，如不遂愿便恶作剧一番的风俗）
各付己帐；各自付帐的聚餐或娱乐活动

remMethod.val: tr + eat(吃) → 招待人吃饭 → 款待

trans.tranOther: something special that you give someone or do for them because you know they will enjoy it

trans.tranCn: 对待， 处理； 医疗， 医治； 款待， 招待； 探讨， 讨论
trans.tranOther: to behave towards someone or something in a particular way
